---
name: "Offline Support"
about: "Allow the app to work offline using Service Workers."
title: "Feature: Offline Support"
labels: [enhancement]
---

**Summary:**
Enable offline access to the activities app using Service Workers.

**Details:**
- Implement Service Worker to cache static assets and activity data.
- Allow users to view activities and sign up/unregister while offline (sync when online).
- Show clear UI indicators for offline/online status.

**Benefit:**
Ensures students can access activities even with unreliable internet connections.
